titleStmt.title: A treatise of the canker of Englands common wealth Deuided into three parts: wherein the author imitating the rule of good phisitions, first, declareth the disease. Secondarily, sheweth the efficient cause thereof. Lastly, a remedy for the same. By Gerrard De Malynes merchant.
titleStmt.author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Field for William Iohnes printer, dwelling in Red-crosse-streete in ship Allie,
